DOC.brief_summary: In prospective monocentric open label trial patient diabetic macular edema treat intravitreal injection ranibizumab give 3 month laser grid month 4 . During follow-up ranibizumab injection perform every 2 month case best-corrected visual acuity decrease 5 letter .
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Injections Ranibizumab With Deferred Laser Grid Laser Photocoagulation Treatment Diabetic Macular Edema With Visual Impairment
DOC.criteria: diabetes mellitus ( 1 or2 ) decrease vision Diabetic Macular Edema ( study eye Best Corrected Visual Acuity < 69 letter use E.T.D.R.S test ) macular edema history severe cardiac disease stroke within 12 month intraocular inflammation
